text: Futhi wathi, “kuphela nizithathele izithombe esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi ngenxa yobungane phakathi kwenu empilweni yalomhlaba besekuthi ngosuku lokuvula kwabafikeleyo abanye benu baphike abanye futhi abanye benu bayoqalekisa abanye futhi indawo yenu yokuhlala kuyoba ngumlilo futhi angeke nibe nabo abasizi”
